title: Episode 35 - Zach Weinberg, Co-founder, President, & COO of Flatiron Health
description: On Tuesday, February 25, 2020, Cornell Tech @ Bloomberg featured Zach Weinberg, Co-founder, President, & COO of Flatiron Health, in conversation with Scarlet Fu of Bloomberg Television. They talked about Weinberg’s transition from food delivery and ad tech startups to one in healthcare, the long path to landing Flatiron’s first customer, the ways in which Roche and Flatiron can accelerate each other’s growth, how Flatiron’s data may lead to better patient outcomes, and how we might all contribute to the advancement of medicine.
dc:creator: Bloomberg
